sn56.37:4.1: “Mendicants, the dawn is the forerunner and precursor of the sunrise.
sn56.37:4.3: In the same way, right view is the forerunner and precursor of truly comprehending the four noble truths.
sn56.37:4.5: A mendicant with right view can expect to truly understand:
sn56.37:4.6: ‘This is suffering’ … ‘This is the origin of suffering’ … ‘This is the cessation of suffering’ … ‘This is the practice that leads to the cessation of suffering’.
sn56.37:5.1: That’s why you should practice meditation …”
